name: OliveWP Companion
author: Spicethemes

sections.description:
OliveWP Companion plugin enhances the functionality of OliveWP theme. This plugin requires OliveWP theme to be installed.

Key Features

  • Trending Post
    • General
    • Typography setting
    • Color setting
  • Starter Sites
    • Demo Import features

External Resources

sections.installation:
1. Upload olivewp-companion.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and extract.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins > Installed Plugins menu in WordPress dashboard.
  3. Done!
sections.changelog:
@Version 1.1.2
* Updated OliveWP Companion plugin options page.
* Added premium starter sites.

@Version 1.1.1
* Added notice after activating the OliveWP Companion plugin.
* Added starter sites option into the OliveWP Companion menu.
* Added notice after activating the starter sites extension.
* Added add-on in extensions tab when we activated the OliveWP Plus plugin.

@Version 1.1
* Added premium starter sites.

@Version 1.0
* Fixed the issue plugin activation through TGMPA.

@Version 0.9
* Added theme options page and Spice Starter Site extensions.
* Added freemius directory.

@Version 0.2
* Resolved issues mentioned by the reviewer.

@Version 0.1
* Initial Release.
